amendment.description: to provide for the consolidation and improvement of authorities for army working-capital funded facilities to engage in public-private partnerships.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3242 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3242 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Grassley. (consideration: CR S6056-6057; text: CR S6056-6057) to provide for the consolidation and improvement of authorities for army working-capital funded facilities to engage in public-private partnerships.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3242 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Grassley.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3242 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
